title: UAT Feedback - SFD checkbox changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN club user is logged in
AND user is attempting to create a MJ Place on 15 Day DL, MJ Place on 60 Day DL, MJ DL transfer (15 or 60), or MJ Recertification
AND user has not yet uploaded a file with label "Standard Form of Diagnosis" to the tx
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Received SFD" checkbox
custom_expected: THEN the txt "An attachment with the label "Standard Form of Diagnosis" must be attached before checking "Receieved SFD"" should appear next to the checkbox

title: UAT Feedback - Adjust 5 Day rule check to 1 day for MJ 7-Day Concussion DL placements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND user is attempting to create an MJ Place on 7 Day Concussion DL tx for a player
AND Placement Date on the tx is more than 1 day prior to current date
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Placement Date must be within 1 day of submission."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: UAT Feedback - Adjust 10 Day rule check to 0 days for MJ 60-Day DL placements
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND user is attempting to Submit a MJ Place on 60 Day DL tx for a player
AND Placement Date on the tx is prior to the current date
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Place on 60-Day DL transactions cannot be backdated."
AND clicking Back should close the modal and return the user to the transaction.
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)
AND the error message "Placement Date must be within X days of submission." should no longer fire at all

title: UAT Feedback - As a user I want to be able to Print without having to save first
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND user has print permissions for DL tx's
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to a DL tx in a preliminary state
custom_expected:
THEN the Print button should appear on all transactions immediately for those users  
AND choosing to print a form should save the transaction as preliminary and generate the appropriate pdf with the information from the player's profile and/or the transaction.  
AND the transaction should remain in edit mode. 
AND the Print button should appear immediately upon opening the transaction if the viewing user has Print permissions - you should not have to save it first.

title: UAT Feedback - As a user I want to see the ebis2.5 interface when printing a player letter
custom_preconds: GIVEN User can print a player letter
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting any player letter from the Create New menu will open a pop-up with the relevant prompts.
custom_expected:
THEN The prompts will be pre-populated according to the individual letter's requirement, and the user will be able to adjust the prepopulated values as needed.
AND Clicking "OK" will generate the pdf of the selected letter using the prompt information entered by the user.
AND Clicking "Cancel" will return the user to the point of entry.

title: UAT Feedback - Add Earliest Reinstatement Date to the Players on Disabled List widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing the DL widget
custom_expected:
THEN Earliest Reinstatement Date is the last column on the Players on Disabled List widget.
AND This date is populated with the player's current Earliest Reinstatement Date (that from his latest placement or transfer).

title: UAT Feedback - As a user I want the Recertification emails to list all overdue Recerts
custom_preconds: GIVEN user receives the Recert emails
custom_steps: WHEN the Recert due email only grabs the date for the earliest recert.  Ex: Lucas Giolito has an outstanding recert for 10/20 and 11/4.  The 11/4 one triggered the emails, but the email says only the 10/20 one is due.
custom_expected: THEN the email will be triggered the same as it is now, but to list all of the outstanding recerts, not just the earliest one. (should not list future dates)

title: UAT Feedback - Make Last Game Date editable for Club users for MN DL Placements
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as club
custom_steps: WHEN user creates MN league DL placement tx
custom_expected:
THEN Last Game Date should continue to default for all users, but should also be editable for Club users.
AND This should only apply to Minor League DL placements.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank Minor League Concussion Return to Play Form letter
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Minor League Concussion Return to Play Form" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected: THEN The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank Standard Form of Diagnosis
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Standard Form of Diagnosis" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected: THEN The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank Consent Form Rehabilitation Assignment  letter
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Consent Form Rehabilitation Assignment" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected:
THEN Users will have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in English if the language selected is English.
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank Consent of Transfer of Rehabilitation Form letter
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Consent of Transfer of Rehabilitation Form" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected:
THEN Users will have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in English if the language selected is English.
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a Consent of Transfer of Rehabilitation Form letter for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Consent of Transfer of Rehabilitation Form" appears as an option in the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile.
custom_expected:
THEN Users will have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND Users will have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND Users will have the ability to select the "Transfer to Club" from the list of Clubs affiliated with the Player's Org.
AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank Minor League Concussion Assessment Form letter
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Minor League Concussion Assessment Form" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected: THEN The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print a blank Acknowledgement of Rehabilitation Directive at Club's ST Facility letter
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Acknowledgement of Rehabilitation Directive at Club's ST Facility" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter.
custom_expected:
THEN Users will have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in English if the language selected is English.
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.

title: As a user I want to be able to print an Acknowledgement of Rehabilitation Directive at Club's ST Facility letter for a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Acknowledgement of Rehabilitation Directive at Club's ST Facility" appears as an option in the Create New menu for players under "Player Letters".
custom_steps: WHEN Selecting this option will print the proper pdf of the letter using the proper information from the player's profile.
custom_expected:
THEN Users will have the ability to alter the Date used for the form. (Should be pre-populated with current date)
AND Users will have the ability to alter the player's name as it will appear on the form. (Should be pre-populated with player's First Last)
AND Users will have the ability to enter the Injury to be populated on the form. 
AND Users will have the ability to enter the Effective Date to be populated on the form. 
AND The form will be generated in English if the language on the player's profile is set to anything other than Spanish. 
AND The form will be generated in Spanish if the language on the player's profile is set to Spanish. 
AND The pdf will follow the provided format and details.
